# kernelWidth

**Instance Property**

The width of the filter window. Must be an odd number.

## Declaration

```swift
var kernelWidth: Int { get }
```

## Properties

- **kernelHeight**: The height of the filter window. Must be an odd number.
- **bias**: The value added to a convolved pixel before it is converted back to its intended storage format.
